title: Senior Prom
additional-notes: The first issue's cover title is 'Calling All Girls, Renamed Senior Prom'

A 1977 renewal for the 1950 book 'Carnival Gypsy' by Dorothy Gilman Butters mentions that it was previously published in a condensed version in Senior Prom.  We do not know the issue(s) in which that version was published, but the copyright renewal record specifies that it is only for the additional material in the book version.
